title: Protect and Service
description: Eloise is a woman on a mission. She needs to find a date for the annual hospital ball and fast. The trouble is she's not only man-free but, after her bastard of an ex has a nasty little curse hurled her way, no human guy will touch her with a barge-pole — not after one of her dates ends up with green acne, another with a nose like Pinocchio… the list goes on.Out of options, Eloise ends up at the offices of the Paranormal Protection Agency. She's not sure what to expect, but she certainly doesn't expect Jared Stone. No one expects Stone…
author: Mina Carter
